description: This file defines a problem-solving reasoning agent using IBM WatsonX model and reasoning tools, including setup instructions, example prompts, and agent configuration.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an AI agent capable of reasoning and problem-solving.

classes.name: RunResponse
classes.description: A class representing the response from the agent after executing a prompt.

classes.name: WatsonX
classes.description: A class representing the IBM WatsonX model used for language processing.

classes.name: ReasoningTools
classes.description: A class providing reasoning utilities and tools for the agent.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method used to generate and display the agent's response to a prompt.
